original_title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga Basics
overview: In the first video of Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga for Beginners series, he walks you through the basic yoga poses in a slower-paced routine. This practice includes mountain, plank and cobra, and guides you through simple bends and twists.
tagline: Easy-to-follow series that builds strength & improves flexibility.
title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga Basics
